tree_details_plotSector.title: Plot Sector
tree_details_plotSector.msg1: Error: Must be an integer between 1 and 8
tree_details_plotSector.msg2: Error: Value does not match historical data

tree_details_treeNumber.title: Tree Number
tree_details_treeNumber.msg1: Error: Must be an integer between 1 and 9999

tree_details_origPlotArea.title: Orig. plot area
tree_details_origPlotArea.msg1: Error: Must be one of: Y, N, X, U

tree_details_genus.title: Genus
tree_details_genus.msg1: Error: Must be a 4 character string
tree_details_genus.msg2: Warning: Value does not match historical data

tree_details_species.title: Species
tree_details_species.msg1: Error: Must be a 3 character string
tree_details_species.msg2: Warning: Value does not match historical data

tree_details_variety.title: Variety
tree_details_variety.msg1: Error: Must be a 3 character string
tree_details_variety.msg2: Warning: Value does not match historical data

tree_details_treeStatus.title: Tree Status
tree_details_treeStatus.msg1: Error: Must be one of: LS, LF, DS
tree_details_treeStatus.msg2: Error: Value cannot be LS or LF when historical data is DS

tree_details_dbh.title: DBH (cm)
tree_details_dbh.msg2: Error: An LS or LF tree's DBH must be greater than historical value
tree_details_dbh.msg3: Warning: Trees with a DBH less than 9.0 should be considered a Small Tree

tree_details_dbhME.title: M or E - DBH
tree_details_dbhME.msg1: Error: Must be one of: M, E

tree_details_treeHeight.title: Tree Ht. (m)
tree_details_treeHeight.msg2: Error: A DS tree cannot have heights greater than historical value
tree_details_treeHeight.msg3: Error: An LS or LF tree with an Intact Stem cannot have heights lower than historical value

tree_details_treeHeightME.title: M or E Ht
tree_details_treeHeightME.msg1: Error: Must be one of: M, E

tree_details_crownClass.title: Crown Class
tree_details_crownClass.msg1: Error: Must be one of: D, C, I, S, V, N
tree_details_crownClass.msg2: Error: LF or DS trees must have a Crown Class of Non-Applicable
tree_details_crownClass.msg3: Error: Value must be N because historical data indicates an LF or DS tree
tree_details_crownClass.msg4: Warning: Value should not be N for an LS Tree with a non-Broken Stem

tree_details_heightToLiveCrownBase.title: Height to Live Crown Base (m)
tree_details_heightToLiveCrownBase.msg2: Error: Value must be not applicable (-9) to match historical data
tree_details_heightToLiveCrownBase.msg3: Error: An LF or DS tree must use the not applicable value (-9)

tree_details_heightToLiveCrownTop.title: Height to Live Crown Top (m)
tree_details_heightToLiveCrownTop.msg2: Error: Value must be not applicable (-9) to match historical data
tree_details_heightToLiveCrownTop.msg3: Error: An LF or DS tree must use the not applicable value (-9)

tree_condition_stem.title: Stem
tree_condition_stem.msg1: Error: Must be one of: B, I

tree_condition_crown.title: Crown
tree_condition_crown.msg1: Error: Must be an integer between 1 and 6

tree_condition_bark.title: Bark
tree_condition_bark.msg1: Error: Must be an integer between 1 and 7
tree_condition_bark.msg2: Error: Value must be greater than or equal to historical data

tree_condition_wood.title: Wood
tree_condition_wood.msg1: Error: Must be an integer between 1 and 8
tree_condition_wood.msg2: Error: Value must be greater than or equal to historical data

tree_stemMapping_azimuthToTree.title: Azimuth to tree
tree_stemMapping_azimuthToTree.msg1: Error: Must be an integer between -1 and 360

tree_damageAgents_location1.title: Location 1
tree_damageAgents_location1.msg1: Error: Must be an integer between -1 and 7

tree_damageAgents_severity1.title: Severity 1
tree_damageAgents_severity1.msg1: Error: Must be one of L, M, H, C, U, or N

tree_damageAgents_location2.title: Location 2
tree_damageAgents_location2.msg1: Error: Must be an integer between -1 and 7

tree_damageAgents_severity2.title: Severity 2
tree_damageAgents_severity2.msg1: Error: Must be one of L, M, H, C, U, or N
